name: The Power of Choice
description:
Still incomplete,but we will make the game with the right time. We made it to participate in the Ludum Dare #34 and could not make it complete,but we tried. It is our first participation in a Game Jam,so we know that we could do better if we had more time.

Controls:

Move with A and D.

To enter a new game,press ENTER

To exit the gameplay, press ESCAPE KEY
